protocol.name: P-GSE24763-2
protocol.text: Stem fragments of 3 mm in length located 2.5 cm apically from the base were treated with NPA for 7 days, excised with a scalpel and collected for liquid nitrogen freezing.

protocol.name: P-GSE24763-3
protocol.text: Plants were grown for 3 weeks on short days (8 hours light 16 hours dark)under standard conditions and then switched to lond days (16 hours light 8 hours dark)

protocol.name: P-GSE24763-4
protocol.text: Total RNA extraction was performed using the RNeasy Plus Micro Kit (QIAGEN) following the manufacturerÂ´s instructions.

protocol.name: P-GSE24763-5
protocol.text: Biotinylated aRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol (Expression Analysis Technical Manual, 2001, Affymetrix).

protocol.name: P-GSE24763-6
protocol.text: Following fragmentation, the aRNAs were hybridized for 16 hr at 45C on GeneChip ATH1 array. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 400.

protocol.name: P-GSE24763-7
protocol.text: GeneChips were scanned using the Affymetrix GeneChip Scanner 3000.

protocol.name: P-GSE24763-8
protocol.text: The data were analyzed using the RMA method using limma and affy libraries in bioconductor (R2.9.0) statiscal package (R).
